name: RocketPods: Max-Q
description:
Thrust your way through the galaxy's HARDEST obstacle courses! RocketPods: Max-Q is a free Spin-Off of the original RocketPods game! Fly your RocketPod through super challenging levels without colliding into walls or obstacles.

Game Features: 
-2 unique RocketPods to fly and unlock (Delta Y and Vanguard)
-Explore 10 levels/Aer Pamaoln gas planet
-9 different Rankings to attain
-Vibrant pre-rendered 3D artwork
-Race your friends and compare post-flight stats 

Controls:
-Arrow Keys & WASD
-Space or Enter to select
-Backspace or Escape to return.
-Game controllers are supported/recommended

Hint:
-Beat game with 50 or less attempts to unlock the Vanguard
